name: La-Liz Store
description:
La-Liz Store is a game where you control  two sister, Laila and Elize, who have to manage a fantasy store where all sort of people go to, from old wizzards to young adventurers an even your run of the mill villager, lern how manage your time, send adventurers in quest for loot and sell it for them at higher price, in the  capitalistic world of La-Liz Store.

The game is still im progress and it is in test usability test phase, if you want to participate in the test here is the link to the form: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1XhU45iW3wgxgbHNZAneRyuv_bvl0VflPOeOA-j27aQY/pre...

All the credits for the assets used are in the Creditos.txt.

English is not my main language so feedback of gramatical errors are appreciated.
